text: Sithara Krishnakumar is an Indian playback singer, composer, dancer and an occasional actor who predominantly works in Malayalam cinema in addition to Tamil, Telugu and Kannada language films. Although she started her art life as a dancer but eventually became a playback singer and debut her career in the year 2007 with the song Pammi Pammi in Malayalam film Athishayan. == Sources == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Indian singers Category:Actors from Kerala Category:Indian composers Category:Indian dancers Category:Indian movie actors
title: Sithara (singer)
